TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit CreateParams extends System.Object

summary.span: 封装创建控件时所需的信息。

span.span: Encapsulates the information needed when creating a control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 中的信息可用于传递有关初始状态和控件外观的信息。The information in a can be used to pass information about the initial state and appearance of a control. 大多数派生控件重写属性可在适当的值传递或包括中的其他信息。Most derived controls override the property to pass in the appropriate values or include additional information in the . 有关创建控制参数的详细信息，请参阅`CreateWindow`并`CreateWindowEx`函数和`CREATESTRUCT`结构中的 Windows Platform SDK 参考文档位于 MSDN 库中。For more information about creating control parameters, see the `CreateWindow` and `CreateWindowEx` functions and the `CREATESTRUCT` structure documentation in the Windows Platform SDK reference located in the MSDN Library. > [!NOTE] > 用于设置的常量， ，和Winuser.h 标头文件中定义属性。The constants used to set the , , and properties are defined in the Winuser.h header file. 此文件由平台 SDK 或 Visual Studio 安装。This file is installed by the Platform SDK or Visual Studio. ## Examples 下面的代码示例将创建派生的类名为`MyIconButton`，并提供所需的按钮可显示图标而不是图像的实现。The following code example creates a derived class named `MyIconButton` and provides the implementation needed for the button to display an Icon rather than an Image. 扩展属性和值添加到会导致该按钮显示的属性而不是。The property is extended and a value added to the property that causes the button to display an rather than an . [!code-cpp[CreateParams#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/CreateParams/CPP/createparams.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[CreateParams#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/CreateParams/CS/createparams.cs#1)] [!code-vb[CreateParams#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/CreateParams/VB/createparams.vb#1)] 下面的代码示例创建一个标准的实例控制和派生控件的实例`MyIconButton`上面的示例中创建。The following code example creates an instance of a standard control and an instance of the derived control, `MyIconButton`, created in the example above. 此示例中，则需要名为 Default.ico 与应用程序相同的位置中的文件。This example requires that there is an file named Default.ico in the same location as the application. 当应用程序启动时，则`Default`上显示图标`MyIconButton`按钮。When the application starts, the `Default` icon is displayed on the `MyIconButton` button. 如果`Default`图标不存在，按钮表面为空。If the `Default` icon is not present, the button face is blank. 当标准单击时，框中会显示，因此您可以选择一个新的图标上显示`MyIconButton`。When the standard is clicked, an box will appear so you can select a new Icon to display on the `MyIconButton`. [!code-cpp[CreateParams#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/CreateParams/CPP/createparams.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[CreateParams#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/CreateParams/CS/createparams.cs#2)] [!code-vb[CreateParams#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/CreateParams/VB/createparams.vb#2)]

summary.span: 获取或设置从中派生该控件的 Windows 类的名称。

span.span: Gets or sets the name of the Windows class to derive the control from.

value.span: 从中派生该控件的 Windows 类的名称。

span.span: The name of the Windows class to derive the control from.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性的默认值是`null`，指示该控件不从现有控件类派生。The default value for this property is `null`, indicating that the control is not derived from an existing control class. 若要从现有控件类派生，此属性中存储系统类的名称。To derive from an existing control class, store the system class name in this property. 例如，若要派生自标准控件，将此属性设置为"按钮"。For example, to derive from the standard control, set this property to "BUTTON".

summary.span: 获取或设置类样式值的按位组合。

span.span: Gets or sets a bitwise combination of class style values.
A bitwise combination of the class style values.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果忽略属性属性不是`null`。The property is ignored if the property is not `null`. 有关创建控制参数的详细信息，请参阅`CreateWindow`并`CreateWindowEx`函数和`CREATESTRUCT`结构中的 Windows Platform SDK 参考文档位于 MSDN 库中。For more information about creating control parameters, see the `CreateWindow` and `CreateWindowEx` functions and the `CREATESTRUCT` structure documentation in the Windows Platform SDK reference located in the MSDN Library. > [!NOTE] > 用于设置的常量， ，和Winuser.h 标头文件中定义属性。The constants used to set the , , and properties are defined in the Winuser.h header file. 此文件由平台 SDK 或 Visual Studio 安装。This file is installed by the Platform SDK or Visual Studio.

summary.span: 获取或设置扩展窗口样式值的按位组合。

span.span: Gets or sets a bitwise combination of extended window style values.

value.span: 扩展窗口样式值的按位组合。

span.span: A bitwise combination of the extended window style values.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性支持扩展的外观和初始状态的值应用于控件。The property supports extended appearance and initial state values to apply to the control. 有关创建控制参数的详细信息，请参阅`CreateWindow`并`CreateWindowEx`函数和`CREATESTRUCT`结构中的 Windows Platform SDK 参考文档位于 MSDN 库中。For more information about creating control parameters, see the `CreateWindow` and `CreateWindowEx` functions and the `CREATESTRUCT` structure documentation in the Windows Platform SDK reference located in the MSDN Library. > [!NOTE] > 用于设置的常量， ，和Winuser.h 标头文件中定义属性。The constants used to set the , , and properties are defined in the Winuser.h header file. 此文件由平台 SDK 或 Visual Studio 安装。This file is installed by the Platform SDK or Visual Studio.

summary.span: 获取或设置创建控件所需的附加参数信息。

span.span: Gets or sets additional parameter information needed to create the control.

value.span: 存放创建控件所需附加参数信息的 。

span.span: The that holds additional parameter information needed to create the control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果要创建多文档界面 (MDI) 客户端窗口，属性必须引用`CLIENTCREATESTRUCT`结构。If you are creating a multiple document interface (MDI) client window, the property must reference a `CLIENTCREATESTRUCT` structure. 有关创建控制参数的详细信息，请参阅`CreateWindow`并`CreateWindowEx`函数和`CLIENTCREATESTRUCT`结构中的 Windows Platform SDK 参考文档位于 MSDN 库中。For more information about creating control parameters, see the `CreateWindow` and `CreateWindowEx` functions and the `CLIENTCREATESTRUCT` structure documentation in the Windows Platform SDK reference located in the MSDN Library.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性控制该控件和其初始状态的外观。The property controls the appearance of the control and its initial state. 有关创建控制参数的详细信息，请参阅`CreateWindow`并`CreateWindowEx`函数和`CREATESTRUCT`结构中的 Windows Platform SDK 参考文档位于 MSDN 库中。For more information about creating control parameters, see the `CreateWindow` and `CreateWindowEx` functions and the `CREATESTRUCT` structure documentation in the Windows Platform SDK reference located in the MSDN Library. > [!NOTE] > 用于设置的常量， ，和Winuser.h 标头文件中定义属性。The constants used to set the , , and properties are defined in the Winuser.h header file. 此文件由平台 SDK 或 Visual Studio 安装。This file is installed by the Platform SDK or Visual Studio. ## Examples 下面的代码示例将创建派生的类名为`MyIconButton`，并提供所需的按钮可显示图标而不是图像的实现。The following code example creates a derived class named `MyIconButton` and provides the implementation needed for the button to display an icon rather than an image. 扩展属性和值添加到会导致该按钮显示的属性而不是。The property is extended and a value added to the property that causes the button to display an rather than an . [!code-cpp[CreateParams#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/CreateParams/CPP/createparams.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[CreateParams#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/CreateParams/CS/createparams.cs#1)] [!code-vb[CreateParams#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/CreateParams/VB/createparams.vb#1)]
